content:
Hey,
After Updating to Zulip 7.2 my organizations User Availability (who is shown as online) stopped working and shows everyone as offline. (Screenshot)
We've already tried re-applying the Personal setting "Display my availability to other users (invisible mode off)" for every user and the same setting in the Organization settings of the Default User Group.
Everyone-is-unavailable.png
I couldnt find anything about this issue online. Is this a known issue or dose anyone have ideas on how to fix this?
This topic was moved here from #issues > User Availability broken by Lauryn Menard.
@Marco - Just a heads up that I moved your message here since you mentioned that you just upgraded to Zulip 7.2
@Marco: Can you show (in a code block) the output of supervisorctl status?

Yes. Thank you for the quick response.
supervisorctl status outputs this:

go-camo                            RUNNING   pid 1286, uptime 6 days, 23:31:02
process-fts-updates                RUNNING   pid 1503260, uptime 4 days, 3:07:19
smokescreen                        RUNNING   pid 1288, uptime 6 days, 23:31:02
zulip-django                       RUNNING   pid 1503309, uptime 4 days, 3:06:59
zulip-tornado                      RUNNING   pid 1503278, uptime 4 days, 3:07:12
zulip-workers:zulip_events         RUNNING   pid 1503229, uptime 4 days, 3:07:25
zulip_deliver_scheduled_emails     RUNNING   pid 1503250, uptime 4 days, 3:07:23
zulip_deliver_scheduled_messages   RUNNING   pid 1503255, uptime 4 days, 3:07:21

We just tried a manual restart of the Zulip server but to no avail.
A problem with user invitations also turned up - similar to the problem described in https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/31-production-help/topic/invitation.20does.20not.20work

@Marco: What version were you upgrading from?

For the invitations problem, have you read our configuration and troubleshooting guides?
